description.english: Successfully caught a butterfly, its beauty stays for you just a moment
description.german: Erfolgreich einen Schmetterling gefangen, seine Schönheit verweilt nur einen Moment für dich
description.french: Attrapé un papillon avec succès, sa beauté ne s'arrête qu'un instant pour vous
description.italian: Preso con successo una farfalla, la sua bellezza si ferma solo un momento per te
description.koreana: 나비를 성공적으로 잡았습니다, 그 아름다움이 당신을 위해 잠시 머뭅니다
description.spanish: Atrapado una mariposa con éxito, su belleza se queda solo un momento para ti
description.schinese: 成功捕捉到一只蝴蝶，它的美丽只为你停留片刻
description.tchinese: 成功捕捉到一隻蝴蝶，牠的美麗只為你停留片刻
description.russian: Успешно поймал бабочку, её красота задержится для тебя лишь на мгновение
description.japanese: 蝶の捕獲に成功、その美しさは一瞬だけあなたのために

displayName.german: Ich habe keine Angst vor Schmerzen
displayName.french: Je n'ai pas peur de la douleur

description.english: Successfully caught a crab, be careful its pincers are not for show
description.german: Erfolgreich eine Krabbe gefangen, Vorsicht vor ihren Scheren
description.french: Attrapé un crabe avec succès, attention ses pinces ne sont pas là pour décorer
description.italian: Preso con successo un granchio, attento alle sue chele
description.koreana: 게를 성공적으로 잡았습니다, 집게발 조심하세요
description.spanish: Atrapado un cangrejo con éxito, cuidado con sus pinzas
description.schinese: 成功捉住螃蟹，小心它的钳子可不是摆设
description.tchinese: 成功捉住螃蟹，小心牠的鉗子可不是擺設
description.russian: Успешно поймал краба, осторожнее с его клешнями
description.japanese: カニの捕獲に成功、鋏には注意して

description.english: Caught a crayfish, this armored warrior's defense is quite tight
description.german: Einen Flusskrebs gefangen, dieser gepanzerte Krieger verteidigt sich gut
description.french: Attrapé une écrevisse, ce guerrier blindé a une défense solide
description.italian: Preso un gambero di fiume, questo guerriero corazzato ha una difesa solida
description.koreana: 가재를 잡았습니다, 이 갑옷 입은 전사의 방어는 상당히 단단합니다
description.spanish: Atrapado un cangrejo de río, este guerrero blindado tiene buena defensa
description.schinese: 捕获小龙虾，这位披甲战士的防守相当严密
description.tchinese: 捕獲小龍蝦，這位披甲戰士的防守相當嚴密
description.russian: Поймал речного рака, этот бронированный воин хорошо защищается
description.japanese: ザリガニを捕獲、鎧をまとった戦士の防御は堅い

description.english: Caught an elegant damselfly, its slender figure is rarely seen
description.german: Eine elegante Kleinlibelle gefangen, ihre schlanke Gestalt ist selten zu sehen
description.french: Attrapé une demoiselle élégante, sa silhouette fine est rarement vue
description.italian: Preso una damigella elegante, la sua figura slanciata è rara da vedere
description.koreana: 우아한 실잠자리를 잡았습니다, 가느다란 모습은 보기 드뭅니다
description.spanish: Atrapado una caballito del diablo elegante, su figura esbelta es rara de ver
description.schinese: 捕捉到优雅的豆娘，它纤细的身影难得一见
description.tchinese: 捕捉到優雅的豆娘，牠纖細的身影難得一見
description.russian: Поймал изящную стрекозу, её стройная фигура редко встречается
description.japanese: 優雅なイトトンボを捕獲、その細身の姿は珍しい

description.english: Successfully caught a dragonfly, this flying expert's agility is beyond imagination
description.german: Erfolgreich eine Libelle gefangen, ihre Beweglichkeit ist unvorstellbar
description.french: Attrapé une libellule avec succès, l'agilité de cette experte du vol dépasse l'imagination
description.italian: Preso con successo una libellula, la sua agilità è incredibile
description.koreana: 잠자리를 성공적으로 잡았습니다, 이 비행 고수의 민첩성은 상상을 초월합니다
description.spanish: Atrapado una libélula con éxito, su agilidad es increíble
description.schinese: 成功捕获蜻蜓，这位飞行高手的敏捷超乎想象
description.tchinese: 成功捕獲蜻蜓，這位飛行高手的敏捷超乎想像
description.russian: Успешно поймал стрекозу, её ловкость невообразима
description.japanese: トンボの捕獲に成功、その飛行技術は想像を超える

description.english: Caught a firefly in the night, that tiny glow is especially precious
description.german: Ein Glühwürmchen in der Nacht gefangen, sein Leuchten ist besonders kostbar
description.french: Attrapé une luciole dans la nuit, cette lueur est particulièrement précieuse
description.italian: Preso una lucciola nella notte, quella luce è particolarmente preziosa
description.koreana: 밤에 반딧불이를 잡았습니다, 그 작은 빛이 특히 소중합니다
description.spanish: Atrapado una luciérnaga en la noche, esa luz es especialmente preciosa
description.schinese: 在夜色中捕捉到萤火虫，那一点微光格外珍贵
description.tchinese: 在夜色中捕捉到螢火蟲，那一點微光格外珍貴
description.russian: Поймал светлячка ночью, этот огонёк особенно ценен
description.japanese: 夜にホタルを捕獲、その微かな光は特別に貴重

description.english: Nobody knows fishing better than me
description.german: Niemand versteht mehr vom Fischen als ich
description.french: Personne ne comprend mieux la pêche que moi
description.italian: Nessuno capisce la pesca meglio di me
description.koreana: 나보다 물고기를 더 잘 아는 사람은 없어
description.spanish: Nadie entiende mejor la pesca que yo
description.schinese: 没有人比我更懂摸鱼了
description.tchinese: 沒有人比我更懂摸魚了
description.russian: Никто не понимает рыбалку лучше меня
description.japanese: 私より魚に詳しい者はいない

description.english: Caught a Chinese hooksnout carp, its blue figure flashes through the water
description.german: Einen Blauen Blitzfisch gefangen, seine blaue Gestalt zuckt durchs Wasser
description.french: Attrapé un poisson bleu éclair, sa silhouette bleue traverse l'eau
description.italian: Preso un pesce fulmine blu, la sua figura blu sfreccia nell'acqua
description.koreana: 꺽지를 잡았습니다, 푸른 몸이 물속을 번개처럼 지나갑니다
description.spanish: Atrapado un pez rayo azul, su figura azul cruza el agua
description.schinese: 捕捉到马口鱼，它蓝色的身影在水中一闪而过
description.tchinese: 捕捉到馬口魚，牠藍色的身影在水中一閃而過
description.russian: Поймал синюю рыбу-молнию, её синяя фигура мелькает в воде
description.japanese: オイカワを捕獲、青い姿が水中を駆け抜ける

description.english: Caught a Acrossocheilus, its golden-black scales shimmer in sunlight
description.german: Einen Goldkantenfisch gefangen, seine gold-schwarzen Schuppen glitzern in der Sonne
description.french: Attrapé un poisson à écailles dorées, ses écailles scintillent au soleil
description.italian: Preso un pesce dalle scaglie dorate, le sue scaglie brillano al sole
description.koreana: 각시붕어를 잡았습니다, 금빛 검은 비늘이 햇빛 아래 반짝입니다
description.spanish: Atrapado un pez de escamas doradas, sus escamas brillan al sol
description.schinese: 捕捉到光唇鱼，金色黑纹的鳞片在阳光下熠熠生辉
description.tchinese: 捕捉到光唇魚，金色黑紋的鱗片在陽光下熠熠生輝
description.russian: Поймал рыбу с золотыми чешуйками, её чешуя сверкает на солнце
description.japanese: カワソズを捕獲、金色の鱗が陽光に輝く

description.english: Caught a silver gudgeon, its silver-white body shines like moonlight in deep pools
description.german: Einen Silberfisch gefangen, sein silberweißer Körper leuchtet wie Mondlicht
description.french: Attrapé un poisson argenté, son corps blanc argenté brille comme la lune
description.italian: Preso un pesce argentato, il suo corpo brilla come la luna
description.koreana: 은어를 잡았습니다, 은백색 몸이 깊은 웅덩이에서 달빛처럼 빛납니다
description.spanish: Atrapado un pez plateado, su cuerpo brilla como la luna
description.schinese: 抓到银鮈，它银白色的身体在深潭中如月光般皎洁
description.tchinese: 抓到銀鮈，牠銀白色的身體在深潭中如月光般皎潔
description.russian: Поймал серебряную рыбу, её тело сияет как лунный свет
description.japanese: シロウオを捕獲、銀白色の体が月光のように輝く

description.english: Caught a Chinese minnow, its blue-green scales sparkle like gems
description.german: Einen Smaragdfisch gefangen, seine blaugrünen Schuppen funkeln wie Edelsteine
description.french: Attrapé un poisson émeraude, ses écailles vert-bleu scintillent comme des gemmes
description.italian: Preso un pesce smeraldo, le sue scaglie verde-blu brillano come gemme
description.koreana: 피라미를 잡았습니다, 청록색 비늘이 보석처럼 반짝입니다
description.spanish: Atrapado un pez esmeralda, sus escamas verde-azul brillan como gemas
description.schinese: 捕获宽鳍鱲，蓝绿色的鳞片像宝石般闪耀
description.tchinese: 捕獲寬鰭鱲，藍綠色的鱗片像寶石般閃耀
description.russian: Поймал изумрудную рыбу, её сине-зелёная чешуя сверкает как драгоценности
description.japanese: オオクチバスを捕獲、青緑色の鱗が宝石のように輝く

description.english: Successfully caught a frog by the riverbank, its alertness makes every approach challenging - caught it while it was singing
description.german: Erfolgreich einen Frosch am Flussufer gefangen, seine Wachsamkeit macht jede Annäherung zur Herausforderung - beim Singen erwischt
description.french: Attrapé une grenouille avec succès au bord de la rivière, sa vigilance rend chaque approche difficile - attrapée pendant qu'elle chantait
description.italian: Preso con successo una rana sulla riva del fiume, la sua vigilanza rende ogni approccio difficile - presa mentre cantava
description.koreana: 강가에서 개구리를 성공적으로 잡았습니다, 경계심이 있어 다가가기 어려웠지만 노래할 때 잡았습니다
description.spanish: Atrapado una rana con éxito en la orilla del río, su vigilancia hace cada acercamiento difícil - atrapada mientras cantaba
description.schinese: 在河岸边成功捕捉青蛙，它的警觉性让每次靠近都充满挑战，趁它唱歌时抓住它
description.tchinese: 在河岸邊成功捕捉青蛙，牠的警覺性讓每次靠近都充滿挑戰，趁牠唱歌時抓住牠
description.russian: Успешно поймал лягушку на берегу реки, её бдительность затрудняет каждое приближение - поймал, когда она пела
description.japanese: 川辺でカエルの捕獲に成功、警戒心が強く近づくのが難しい - 鳴いている時に捕まえた

description.english: Caught a lizard, its speed makes every attempt full of challenge
description.german: Eine Eidechse gefangen, ihre Geschwindigkeit macht jeden Versuch herausfordernd
description.french: Attrapé un lézard, sa vitesse rend chaque tentative pleine de défis
description.italian: Preso una lucertola, la sua velocità rende ogni tentativo impegnativo
description.koreana: 도마뱀을 잡았습니다, 그 속도 때문에 매 시도가 도전적입니다
description.spanish: Atrapado una lagartija, su velocidad hace cada intento desafiante
description.schinese: 捕捉到蜥蜴，它的速度让每次尝试都充满挑战
description.tchinese: 捕捉到蜥蜴，牠的速度讓每次嘗試都充滿挑戰
description.russian: Поймал ящерицу, её скорость делает каждую попытку сложной
description.japanese: トカゲを捕獲、その速さで毎回挑戦的

description.english: Collected 100 river shells, your obsession with river shells is amazing
description.german: 100 Flussmuscheln gesammelt, deine Leidenschaft ist erstaunlich
description.french: Collectionné 100 coquillages de rivière, votre passion est impressionnante
description.italian: Raccolte 100 conchiglie di fiume, la tua passione è incredibile
description.koreana: 강 조개 100개를 수집했습니다, 강 조개에 대한 집착이 놀랍습니다
description.spanish: Coleccionado 100 conchas de río, tu obsesión es asombrosa
description.schinese: 收集100个河贝，你对河贝的痴迷让人惊叹
description.tchinese: 收集100個河貝，你對河貝的痴迷讓人驚嘆
description.russian: Собрал 100 речных ракушек, твоя одержимость впечатляет
description.japanese: 川貝を100個収集、その情熱に驚嘆

description.english: I know what this game is called, I collected all the letters
description.german: Ich kenne den Namen dieses Spiels, ich habe alle Buchstaben gesammelt
description.french: Je connais le nom de ce jeu, j'ai collecté toutes les lettres
description.italian: So come si chiama questo gioco, ho raccolto tutte le lettere
description.koreana: 이 게임 이름을 압니다, 모든 문자를 수집했습니다
description.spanish: Sé cómo se llama este juego, he coleccionado todas las letras
description.schinese: 我知道这个游戏叫什么名字，我收集了所有的字母
description.tchinese: 我知道這個遊戲叫什麼名字，我收集了所有的字母
description.russian: Я знаю название этой игры, я собрал все буквы
description.japanese: このゲームの名前がわかった、全ての文字を集めた

description.english: Successfully sailed a paper boat to the finish line, this is my childhood
description.german: Ein Papierboot erfolgreich ans Ziel gebracht, das ist meine Kindheit
description.french: Fait naviguer un bateau en papier jusqu'à l'arrivée, c'est mon enfance
description.italian: Portata con successo una barchetta di carta al traguardo, questa è la mia infanzia
description.koreana: 종이배를 성공적으로 결승점까지 띄웠습니다, 이것이 나의 어린 시절입니다
description.spanish: Llevado un barco de papel con éxito a la meta, esta es mi infancia
description.schinese: 让小纸船成功漂流到终点，这是我的童年
description.tchinese: 讓小紙船成功漂流到終點，這是我的童年
description.russian: Успешно довёл бумажный кораблик до финиша, это моё детство
description.japanese: 紙の船を無事にゴールまで流した、これが私の子供時代

description.english: Going with the flow, it will eventually reach its destination
description.german: Mit dem Strom schwimmend, erreicht es endlich sein Ziel
description.french: Suivant le courant, elle atteindra finalement sa destination
description.italian: Segue la corrente, alla fine raggiungerà la sua destinazione
description.koreana: 흐름을 따라가면, 결국 도착할 곳에 도달합니다
description.spanish: Yendo con la corriente, eventualmente llegará a su destino
description.schinese: 顺流而下，终会到达该去的地方
description.tchinese: 順流而下，終會到達該去的地方
description.russian: Плывя по течению, она в конце концов достигнет своего назначения
description.japanese: 流れに任せて、いつかは着くべき場所に

description.english: Opened 100 stones, curiosity is the first step to treasure hunting
description.german: 100 Steine geöffnet, Neugier ist der erste Schritt zur Schatzsuche
description.french: Ouvert 100 pierres, la curiosité est le premier pas vers la chasse au trésor
description.italian: Aperto 100 pietre, la curiosità è il primo passo verso la caccia al tesoro
description.koreana: 돌 100개를 열었습니다, 호기심은 보물 찾기의 첫걸음입니다
description.spanish: Abierto 100 piedras, la curiosidad es el primer paso hacia la caza del tesoro
description.schinese: 打开100个石头，好奇心是寻宝的第一步
description.tchinese: 打開100個石頭，好奇心是尋寶的第一步
description.russian: Открыл 100 камней, любопытство - первый шаг к охоте за сокровищами
description.japanese: 石を100個開けた、好奇心は宝探しの第一歩

description.english: Opened 500 stones, nothing can stop your pursuit of treasure
description.german: 500 Steine geöffnet, nichts kann deine Schatzsuche aufhalten
description.french: Ouvert 500 pierres, rien n'arrête votre quête de trésor
description.italian: Aperto 500 pietre, nulla ferma la tua ricerca del tesoro
description.koreana: 돌 500개를 열었습니다, 보물을 찾는 당신의 열정을 막을 수 없습니다
description.spanish: Abierto 500 piedras, nada detiene tu búsqueda del tesoro
description.schinese: 打开500个石头，没有什么能阻挡你对宝藏的追求
description.tchinese: 打開500個石頭，沒有什麼能阻擋你對寶藏的追求
description.russian: Открыл 500 камней, ничто не остановит твой поиск сокровищ
description.japanese: 石を500個開けた、何も宝への追求を止められない

description.english: Picked up over 100 stones that can be used for stone skipping
description.german: Über 100 Steine fürs Steinehüpfen gesammelt
description.french: Ramasse plus de 100 pierres utilisables pour faire des ricochets
description.italian: Raccolte oltre 100 pietre utilizzabili per farle rimbalzare sull'acqua
description.koreana: 돌 던지기에 사용할 수 있는 돌 100개 이상을 주웠습니다
description.spanish: Recogido más de 100 piedras utilizables para hacerlas rebotar en el agua
description.schinese: 拾取超过100个可以用作打水漂的石头
description.tchinese: 拾取超過100個可以用作打水漂的石頭
description.russian: Подобрал более 100 камней, пригодных для запускания по воде
description.japanese: 水切りに使える石を100個以上拾った

description.english: Skipped stones over 3 times
description.german: Steine über 3-mal hüpfen lassen
description.french: Fait ricocher des pierres plus de 3 fois
description.italian: Fatto rimbalzare pietre oltre 3 volte
description.koreana: 돌을 3번 이상 튕겼습니다
description.spanish: Hecho rebotar piedras más de 3 veces
description.schinese: 打水漂超过3个
description.tchinese: 打水漂超過3個
description.russian: Запустил камни более 3 раз
description.japanese: 石を3回以上跳ねさせた

description.english: Skipped stones over 6 times, this isn't just simple luck anymore
description.german: Steine über 6-mal hüpfen lassen, das ist nicht mehr nur Glück
description.french: Fait ricocher des pierres plus de 6 fois, ce n'est plus juste de la chance
description.italian: Fatto rimbalzare pietre oltre 6 volte, non è più solo fortuna
description.koreana: 돌을 6번 이상 튕겼습니다, 이건 단순한 운이 아닙니다
description.spanish: Hecho rebotar piedras más de 6 veces, esto ya no es solo suerte
description.schinese: 打水漂超过6个，这就不是简单的运气好了
description.tchinese: 打水漂超過6個，這就不是簡單的運氣好了
description.russian: Запустил камни более 6 раз, это уже не просто удача
description.japanese: 石を6回以上跳ねさせた、これは単なる運じゃない

description.english: Achieved 9 skips in one throw, this is simply unbelievable!
description.german: 9 Hüpfer mit einem Wurf erreicht, das ist einfach unglaublich!
description.french: Atteint 9 ricochets en un lancer, c'est tout simplement incroyable !
description.italian: Raggiunti 9 rimbalzi in un lancio, questo è semplicemente incredibile!
description.koreana: 한 번에 9번 튕기기 달성, 이건 정말 믿기지 않습니다!
description.spanish: Logrado 9 rebotes en un solo lanzamiento, ¡esto es simplemente increíble!
description.schinese: 在一次打水漂总总计反弹达到9次，这简直难以置信！
description.tchinese: 在一次打水漂總計反彈達到9次，這簡直難以置信！
description.russian: Достиг 9 запусков за один бросок, это просто невероятно!
description.japanese: 一投で9回の水切りを達成、これは本当に信じられない！

displayName.japanese: 石口澗（シーコウジャン）

description.english: Complete the drifting journey in the Shikoujian Ravine map
description.german: Schließe die Treibfahrt in der Shikoujian-Schlucht ab
description.french: Terminez le parcours de dérive dans la carte du Ravin de Shikoujian
